      • home_press

        private void home_press()
        The action that happens when the home button is pressed. Brings up dialog with options to save and takes user to the home screen.

      • back_press

        private void back_press()
        The action that happens when the back button is pressed. Brings up dialog with options to save and takes user to the match list.

      • previous_press

        private void previous_press()
        The action that happens when the previous match button is pressed. Brings up dialog with options to save and takes user to match scout the previous match.

      • next_press

        private void next_press()
        The action that happens when the next match button is pressed. Brings up dialog with options to save and takes user to match scout the next match.
